TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrincipalContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 封装对其执行所有操作的服务器或域、用作这些操作的基础的容器和用于执行这些操作的凭据。

span.span: Encapsulates the server or domain against which all operations are performed, the container that is used as the base of those operations, and the credentials used to perform the operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以执行搜索操作的主体上下文定义搜索基础和对插入操作上下文定义向其插入对象的容器。For search operations, the principal context defines the search base, and for insert operations the context defines the container into which the object is inserted.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数的参数和服务器上，执行验证，但不是尝试验证凭据。The constructors perform validation of the parameters and server, but not do not attempt to validate credentials. 未指定容器创建主体上下文对象，它可能用于表示多个不同的容器。When the principal context object is created without specifying a container, it may be used to represent multiple distinct containers. 一个容器可能用作查询操作的基础，而其他容器可容纳新创建主体对象。One container may be used as the base of query operations, while additional containers can hold newly-created principal objects. 例如，当用户或组插入域上下文类型，则帐户管理 API 将默认的已知用户容器中，使用"CN = Users，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com"。For example, when users or groups are inserted into the domian context type, the Account Management API uses the default well-known user container, "CN=Users,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com". API 时在存储区中插入计算机时，使用默认值"CN = Computers，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com"容器。When computers are inserted in the store, the API uses the default "CN=Computers,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com" container. 请注意，可以由域管理员更改默认容器名称。Note that the default container names can be changed by the domain administrator. 主体对象构造函数只能指定一个主体上下文，因为当应用程序创建的域上下文而无需指定容器作为默认行为公开其他上下文。Since the principal object constructors can only specify one principal context, additional contexts are exposed as the default behavior when the application creates a domain context without specifying a container. 因为应用程序目录没有已知的容器，应用程序必须在构造函数中指定一个容器或引发。Since the application directory does not have well-known containers, the application must specify a container in the constructor or the is thrown. 因为 SAM 没有容器，如果应用程序尝试以构造函数中指定的容器，将引发。Since SAM does not have containers, a is thrown if the application attempts to specify a container in the constructor. 在将用户名称用作参数的构造函数的每个版本`userName`字符串可以采用各种不同的格式。In each version of the constructor that takes a user name as a parameter, the `userName` string can be in various different formats. 有关三个支持的 NameFormats 是 Nt4Name、 UserPrincipalName 和 SamAccountName。The three supported NameFormats for are Nt4Name, UserPrincipalName, and SamAccountName. 有关名称格式的详细信息，请参阅 ADS_NAME_TYPE_ENUM 文档[此处](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99942)。For more information about name formats, see the ADS_NAME_TYPE_ENUM documentation [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99942).

MemberSignature.Value: public PrincipalContext (System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType contextType);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType contextType) cil managed
public: PrincipalContext(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::ContextType contextType);

param.name: contextType
param.span: 一个 枚举值，指定主体上下文的存储区的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of store for the principal context.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context type.

exception.span: 在使用应用程序目录上下文时，必须指定名称或容器。

span.span: A name or container must be specified when using the application directory context.

exception.span: 参数不包含有效的 枚举值。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public PrincipalContext (System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType contextType, string name);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType contextType, string name) cil managed
public: PrincipalContext(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::ContextType contextType, System::String ^ name);

param.name: contextType
param.span: 一个 枚举值，指定主体上下文的存储区的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of store for the principal context.

param.name: name
param.span: 用于 上下文类型的域或服务器的名称、用于 上下文类型的计算机名称或承载 实例的服务器和端口的名称。

span.span: The name of the domain or server for context types, the machine name for context types, or the name of the server and port hosting the instance.

param.span: 如果 上下文类型的名称为 null，则此上下文是运行该线程的用户主体的域的域控制器。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type this context is a domain controller for the domain of the user principal under which the thread is running.

param.span: 如果 上下文类型的名称为 null，则此名称是本地计算机名称。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type, this is the local machine name.

param.span: 对于 上下文类型，此参数不能为 null。

span.span: This parameter cannot be null for context types.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文类型和名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context type and name.

exception.span: 在 参数中指定 时，必须指定名称。

span.span: A name must be specified when is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 参数不包含有效的 枚举值。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public PrincipalContext (System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType contextType, string name, string container);

public: PrincipalContext(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::ContextType contextType, System::String ^ name, System::String ^ container);

param.name: contextType
param.span: 一个 枚举值，指定主体上下文的存储区的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of store for the principal context.

param.name: name
param.span: 用于 上下文类型的域或服务器的名称、用于 上下文类型的计算机名称或承载 实例的服务器和端口的名称。

span.span: The name of the domain or server for context types, the machine name for context types, or the name of the server and port hosting the instance.

param.span: 如果 上下文类型的名称为 null，则此上下文是运行该线程的用户主体的域的域控制器。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type this context is a domain controller for the domain of the user principal under which the thread is running.

param.span: 如果 上下文类型的名称为 null，则此名称是本地计算机名称。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type, this is the local machine name.

param.span: 对于 上下文类型，此参数不能为 null。

span.span: This parameter cannot be null for context types.

param.name: container
param.span: 存储区上要用作上下文的根的容器。

span.span: The container on the store to use as the root of the context.

param.span: 所有查询都在此根下执行，并且所有插入都在此容器中执行。

span.span: All queries are performed under this root, and all inserts are performed into this container.

param.span: 对于 和 上下文类型，此参数是容器对象的可分辨名称。

span.span: For and context types, this parameter is the distinguished name of a container object.

param.span: 对于 上下文类型，此参数必须设置为 null。

span.span: For context types, this parameter must be set to null.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文类型、名称和容器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context type, name, and container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能在连接到服务器，如果为指定的容器的后续目录操作调用中引发主体上下文不是有效的容器。The may be thrown in subsequent directory operations calls that connect to the server if the container specified for a principal context is not a valid container. 容器定义为其架构类具有的主体类的对象用户、 组或计算机，其 possibleInferiors 属性中的。A container is defined as an object whose schema class has the principal classes, either user, group, or computer, in its possibleInferiors attribute.

exception.span: 在 参数中指定 上下文类型时，不能指定容器。

span.span: A container cannot be specified when the context type is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 在 参数中指定 时，必须指定 name 或 container。

span.span: A name or container must be specified when is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 参数不包含有效的 枚举值。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid enumeration value.

param.span: 一个 枚举值，指定主体上下文的存储区的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of store for the principal context.

param.name: name
param.span: 用于 上下文类型的域或服务器的名称、用于 上下文类型的计算机名称或承载 实例的服务器和端口的名称。

param.name: userName
param.span: 用于连接到存储区的用户名。

span.span: The username used to connect to the store.

param.span: 如果 username 和 password 参数都为 null，则使用当前进程的凭据。

span.span: If the username and password parameters are both null, the credentials of the current process are used.

param.span: 否则，username 和 password 都不可以为 null，并使用这两个参数指定的凭据来连接到存储区。

span.span: Otherwise, both username and password must be non-null, and the credentials they specify are used to connect to the store.

span.span: Otherwise, both username and password must be non-null, and the credentials they specify are used to connect to the store.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文类型、名称、容器、上下文选项、用户名和密码初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context type, name, container, context options, username, and password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能在连接到服务器，如果为指定的容器的后续目录操作调用中引发主体上下文不是有效的容器。The may be thrown in subsequent directory operations calls that connect to the server if the container specified for a principal context is not a valid container. 容器定义为其架构类具有的主体类的对象用户、 组或计算机，其 possibleInferiors 属性中的。A container is defined as an object whose schema class has the principal classes, either user, group, or computer, in its possibleInferiors attribute.

exception.span: 和 参数必须为 null 或包含值。

span.span: The and parameters must either be null or contain a value.

exception.span: 在 参数中指定 上下文类型时，不能指定容器。

span.span: A container cannot be specified when the context type is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 在 参数中指定 时，必须指定 name 或 container。

span.span: A name or container must be specified when is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 参数不包含有效的 枚举值。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid enumeration value.

exception.span: 参数不包含有效 枚举值的组合。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a combination of valid enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ConnectedServer { get; }
.property instance string ConnectedServer
Public ReadOnly Property ConnectedServer As String
public: property System::String ^ ConnectedServer { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取主体上下文连接到的服务器的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the server to which the principal context is connected.

value.span: 主体上下文连接到的服务器的名称；如果主体上下文未连接到服务器，则为 null。

span.span: The name of the server to which the principal context is connected or null if the principal context is not connected to a server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当上下文类型是，此属性返回的域控制器或应用程序目录实例的名称。When the context type is , this property returns the name of the domain controller or application directory instance. 当上下文类型是，此属性返回的计算机名称。When the context type is , this property returns the machine name.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Container { get; }
.property instance string Container
Public ReadOnly Property Container As String
public: property System::String ^ Container { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在构造函数的容器参数中指定的值。

span.span: Gets the value specified in the container parameter in the constructor.

value.span: 存储区上要用作上下文的根的容器；如果未指定容器，则为 null。

span.span: The container on the store to use as the root of the context or null if the container is not specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有查询都在此根下执行，并且所有插入都在此容器中执行。All queries are performed under this root, and all inserts are performed into this container. 有关和上下文类型，此属性是容器对象的可分辨的名称。For and context types, this property is the distinguished name of a container object. 有关上下文类型，此属性必须为 null。For context types, this property must be null.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType ContextType { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType ContextType
Public ReadOnly Property ContextType As ContextType
public: property System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::ContextType ContextType { System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::ContextType get(); };

summary.span: 获取上下文类型，该上下文类型指定主体上下文的存储区的类型。

span.span: Gets the context type that specifies the type of store for the principal context.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指定要连接到的目标的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of target to connect to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序不是直接创建的主体的上下文和指定上下文类型时，使用此属性。This property is used when the application does not directly create the principal context and specify the context type. 例如，当应用程序枚举组成员身份，则此属性可以用于确定与主体所属的存储的类型。For example, when the application enumerates group membership, this property can be used to determine the type of store to which the principal belongs.

public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 处置 对象的当前实例。

span.span: Disposes the current instance of the object.

Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取构造函数中指定作为 参数的值。

span.span: Gets the value specified as the parameter in the constructor.

value.span: 用于 上下文类型的域或服务器的名称、用于 上下文类型的主机名称或承载 实例的服务器的名称，如果未设置名称，则为 null。

span.span: The name of the domain or server for contexts types, the host name for context types, the name of the server hosting the instance, or null if no name is set.

span.span: Gets the options specified in the parameter of the constructor.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指定要连接到的目标的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of target to connect to.

MemberSignature.Value: public string UserName { get; }
.property instance string UserName
Public ReadOnly Property UserName As String
public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在构造函数的用户名参数中指定的值。

span.span: Gets the value specified in the username parameter in the constructor.

value.span: 用于连接到存储区的用户名；如果不存在用户名，则为 null。

span.span: The username used to connect to the store, or null if no user name exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过将其传递的任意一种各种不同的格式的用户名称设置此属性。This property can be set by passing it a user name in any one of various different formats. 有关格式的可接受类型的完整列表，请参阅 ADS_NAME_TYPE_ENUM 文档[此处](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99942)。For a complete list of the acceptable types of formats, see the ADS_NAME_TYPE_ENUM documentation [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99942).

summary.span: 创建到服务器的连接，如果连接成功，则验证指定的凭据。

span.span: Creates the connection to the server and validates the specified credentials if the connection is successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `userName`这两个重载此方法中的参数必须采用格式*用户名*(例如， *mcampbell*) 而非*域 \ 用户名*或*username@domain*.The `userName` argument in both overloads of this method must take the form *username* (for example, *mcampbell*) rather than *domain\username* or *username@domain*.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ValidateCredentials (string userName, string password);

Public Function ValidateCredentials (userName As String, password As String) As Boolean
public: bool ValidateCredentials(System::String ^ userName, System::String ^ password);

param.name: userName
param.span: 在服务器上验证的用户名。

span.span: The username that is validated on the server.

param.span: 有关 格式的详细信息，请参阅“备注”部分。

span.span: See the Remarks section for more information on the format of .

param.name: password
param.span: 在服务器上验证的密码。

span.span: The password that is validated on the server.

summary.span: 创建到服务器的连接并返回一个布尔值，该值指定所指定的用户名和密码是否有效。

span.span: Creates the connections to the server and returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the specified username and password are valid.

returns.span: 如果凭据有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the credentials are valid; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将绑定到构造函数中指定的服务器。The method binds to the server specified in the constructor. 如果`username`和`password`自变量是`null`，构造函数中指定的凭据进行验证。If the `username` and `password` arguments are `null`, the credentials specified in the constructor are validated. 如果在构造函数中，未指定凭据和`username`和`password`参数`null`，此方法会默认凭据验证当前的主体。If no credential were specified in the constructor, and the `username` and `password` parameters are `null`, this method validates the default credentials for the current principal. `userName`参数必须采用格式*用户名*(例如， *mcampbell*) 而非*域 \ 用户名*或* username@domain*.The `userName` argument must take the form *userName* (for example, *mcampbell*) rather than *domain\username* or *username@domain*.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ValidateCredentials (string userName, string password, System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextOptions options);

Public Function ValidateCredentials (userName As String, password As String, options As ContextOptions) As Boolean
public: bool ValidateCredentials(System::String ^ userName, System::String ^ password, System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::ContextOptions options);

param.name: userName
param.span: 在服务器上验证的用户名。

span.span: The username that is validated on the server.

param.span: 有关 格式的信息，请参阅“备注”部分。

param.span: 在服务器上验证的密码。

span.span: The password that is validated on the server.

param.name: options
param.span: 一个或多个 枚举值的组合，这些枚举值指定用于绑定到服务器的选项。

span.span: A combination of one or more enumeration values the options used to bind to the server.

param.span: 此参数只能指定使用/不使用 SSL 的简单绑定或 Negotiate 绑定。

span.span: This parameter can only specify Simple bind with or without SSL, or Negotiate bind.

summary.span: 创建到服务器的连接并返回一个布尔值，该值指定所指定的用户名和密码是否有效。

span.span: Creates the connections to the server and returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the specified user name and password are valid.

summary.span: 此方法对用户名和密码执行快速凭据验证。

span.span: This method performs fast credential validation of the username and password.

returns.span: 如果凭据有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the credentials are valid; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将绑定到构造函数中指定的服务器。The method binds to the server specified in the constructor. 如果`username`和`password`参数为 null，构造函数中指定的凭据进行验证。If the `username` and `password` parameters are null, the credentials specified in the constructor are validated. 如果在构造函数中，未指定凭据和`username`和`password`参数为 null，此方法会默认凭据验证当前的主体。If no credential were specified in the constructor, and the `username` and `password` parameters are null, this method validates the default credentials for the current principal. `userName`参数必须采用格式*用户名*(例如， *mcampbell*) 而非*域 \ 用户名*或* username@domain*.The `userName` argument must take the form *username* (for example, *mcampbell*) rather than *domain\username* or *username@domain*.
